returns._0: uint256 : total LP staked by given account address

currentEpoch().details: Calculates the nth 8-hour window frame since the heartbeat's start time

rewardRate(uint256).details: Series 1 : Epochs : 162-254 Total B20 distributed : 32,812.50 Distribution duration : 31 days and 8 hours (Jan 28:16:00 to Feb 29 59:59:59 GMT) Series 2 : Epochs : 255-347 Total B20 distributed : 18,750 Distribution duration : 31 days (Mar 1 00:00:00 GMT to Mar 31 59:59:59 GMT) Series 3 : Epochs : 348-437 Total B20 distributed : 14,062.50 Distribution duration : 30 days (Apr 1 00:00:00 GMT to Apr 30 59:59:59 GMT) Series 4 : Epochs : 438-530 Total B20 distributed : 9,375 Distribution duration : 31 days (May 1 00:00:00 GMT to May 31 59:59:59 GMT) Series 5 : Epochs : 531-620 Total B20 distributed : 9,375 Distribution duration : 30 days (Jun 1 00:00:00 GMT to Jun 30 59:59:59 GMT) Series 6 : Epochs : 621-713 Total B20 distributed : 9,375 Distribution duration : 31 days (Jul 1 00:00:00 GMT to Jul 31 59:59:59 GMT)

returns._0: B20 Tokens distributed per second during the given epoch

stake(uint256).details: Increases count of total LP Token staked in the current epoch. Increases count of LP Token staked for the caller in the current epoch. Register that caller last staked in the current epoch. Perform actions from BasePool.stake().

params.amount: : Amount of LP Token to stake

returns._0: uint256 : value of the _totalSupply which stores total LP Tokens staked

unstake(uint256).details: : Decreases count of total LP Token staked Decreases count of LP Token staked for the msg.sender LP Token is transferred from the Pool to the msg.sender

params.amount: : Amount of LP Token to withdraw / unstake

unstakeAndClaim().details: : Perform actions from unstake() Perform actions from claim()

balanceOf(address).notice: Displays LP Token staked per account

claim().notice: Transfers earnings from previous epochs to the caller

constructor.notice: Registers the Pool name as B20ETHUNIV2B20Pool as Pool name, B20-WETH-UNIV2 as the LP Token, and B20 as the Reward Token.

currentEpoch().notice: Calculates current epoch value from the block timestamp

earned(address).notice: Displays earnings of an address so far. Useful to display claimable rewards on the frontend

epochEndTimeFromTimestamp(uint256).notice: Displays timestamp when a given epoch will end

epochFromTimestamp(uint256).notice: Displays the epoch which contains the given timestamp

epochStartTimeFromTimestamp(uint256).notice: Displays timestamp when a given epoch began

rewardPerStake().notice: Displays reward tokens per Lp token staked. Useful to display APY on the frontend

rewardRate(uint256).notice: Displays total B20 rewards distributed per second in a given epoch.

stake(uint256).notice: Stake / Deposit LP Token into the Pool.

totalSupply().notice: Displays the total LP Token staked

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstake / Withdraw staked LP Token from the Pool

unstakeAndClaim().notice: Unstake the staked LP Token and claim corresponding earnings from the Pool

userdoc.notice: Inherits the BasePool contract, and contains reward distribution logic for the B20 token.
